cast.overview: In a world in which Great Britain has become a fascist state, a masked vigilante known only as “V” conducts guerrilla warfare against the oppressive British government. When V rescues a young woman from the secret police, he finds in her an ally with whom he can continue his fight to free the people of Britain.
cast.title: V for Vendetta

cast.overview: During World War II, the British Army assigns a group of competent soldiers to carry out a mission against the Nazi forces behind enemy lines... A true story about a secret British WWII organization — the Special Operations Executive. Founded by Winston Churchill, their irregular warfare against the Germans helped to change the course of the war, and gave birth to modern black operations.
cast.title: The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare

details.biography: Paul Antony-Barber was born on 1 January 1953 in the United Kingdom. He is an actor, known for Hereafter (2010), Home Fires (2015) and House of Anubis (2011). He is married to Jacinta Mulcahy. He was previously married to Glynis Barber.
details.name: Paul Antony-Barber
